Summary: glowing ball like, it came down slow from sky and right behind mountain in front of me, would like to check area out with someone, i know where the area is
trends: There have been 8 other sightings in Roseburg
There were no other sightings in Roseburg on or around June 14th 2012
divs: Sighting Detailsstanding out on porch smoking, with my girlfriend whom also witnessed , i spotted the yellow orange lighted glowing oval looking craft or object, coming down very slow, at first i thought it was stationary but noticed it was lowering, and i said honey what is that, I am very much into aviation , and it did not take long for me to discredit it being any manned craft, it moved just a bit faster as it got close to earth, right before it came to the top of mountain it went dark then back on again then lowered behind mountain,i know it went behind mountain due to the fact i saw the light hover behind the trees at the top, for a second after hovering it dropped behind, i watched for some time and never saw it go back up, but i could not stay out all night, while i was watching to see if it would come back up, i say another way up maybe space, at first i thought a satellite, the speed was about right but then for a moment i could barely see oranges yellow color then by surprise it cut right very sharply into another path and kept going, i am pretty smart and try to dismiss any and all possibility first before coming to the UFO conclusion, i would be great full talking to someone about this, because i would like to show where and see the area myself, about a year ago we both saw another one pretty much do the same thing in h same area, only it did not have the chance to duck behind anything, and it was not all the way dark, but it just vanished, when we were trying to figure out what it was this was about 11:30 pm give or take a few minutes
